content: mid-calf socks with unusual cuff and simple heel for valentine day you can make measurement as on the scheme in pattern make your sample of broken rib pattern 4 x 1 and count you own gauge for this socks the count of stitches must be multiple of 10 for example 60 70 or 80 stitches in the round you can sent me donation for building craft room if you like my free patterns boosty to/knitting_hour
